name: D-Link DWA-548 802.11a/b/g/n PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Security:
Wi-Fi Protected Access (WPA & WPA2)
64/128-bit WEP
Wi-Fi Protected Setup - PIN & PBC
Features: [IEEE 802.11n and 802.11g Compliant, Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) for easy connection to a wireless network, Works with Windows ZeroConfiguration Utility, PCI Express Interface Provides Higher Performance than a Legacy PCI Interface.]
